ch0110_01_kasumi/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you ready to get out there and
do some exploring today?
ch0110_01_kasumi/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on—let’s give it all we’ve got!
And don’t be afraid to ask questions, OK?
You can ask me anything!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_01_10:
So, what’s your policy when it comes to
training up your Pokémon?
ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_02_10:
I mean, what do you think about when
choosing a Pokémon to be your partner
in a sync pair?
ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_03_10:
When you’re aiming to master something,
I feel like sticking to a policy is super important.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0702_01_10:
You and your Pokémon always look like
you’re having so much fun while you battle.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0702_02_10:
Whatever your personal policy is when it
comes to training, I’m sure it must be as
all-out powerful as mine!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_01_10:
I’m so excited for the Pokémon Masters League!
Only the toughest Trainers get to compete.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_02_10:
If I get the chance to battle it out, I’d love to
go up against a certain Ice-type Trainer...
ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_03_10:
Lorelei, from the Indigo League Elite Four
in Kanto! I’ll show her what an all-out
offensive looks like!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_01_10:
I’ve always looked up to Lorelei’s calm, cool,
intellectual battle style.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_02_10:
I’ve already battled against so many different
Trainers since coming to Pasio.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_03_10: I feel like I’m bound to face her eventually!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_01_10:
Water-type Pokémon are all so adorable,
don’t you think?
ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_02_10:
Starmie, Psyduck, Dewgong, Quagsire, Seaking,
Lanturn, Slowbro...
ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_03_10:
Lapras, Gyarados, Horsea, Blastoise,
Seel, Seadra, Poliwhirl...
ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_04_10:
I love every last one of them! But it’s Starmie here
that I chose to partner up with as a sync pair.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_01_10: Do you like Water-type Pokémon, too?
ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_02_10:
Starmie is so nice. It always helps me out
with morning training.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_03_10:
And there’s nothing like surfing the waves
on a Lapras! Let me know if you ever
feel like giving it a shot!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_01_10:
That red crystal in the center of Starmie’s body
is what we call its “core.” It kinda looks like
a jewel, right?
ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_02_10:
Well, it may be pretty, but Starmie’s not just 
for looks! Starmie is actually super fast.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s also great at supporting its allies—
Starmie’s just a really dependable Pokémon
all around!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_01_10:
Did you know that Bubble Beam is one of
Starmie’s specialties?
ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_02_10:
As moves go, it’s a lot more powerful than
Bubble. The number of bubbles it spews out
is really amazing!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_03_10:
Next time we battle, I’ll show you what I’m
talking about!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_01_10:
I’ve done a lot of traveling, even before
coming here to Pasio.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_02_10:
But ever since I teamed up with you,
I’ve felt like my Pokémon and I have
become closer than ever before.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_03_10:
Battling on a team with you has helped me
realize so many things I never noticed before.
ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_04_10:
I’m so glad I decided to come to Pasio!
And thank you!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_01_10:
For a long time, it was my dream to go off on
a journey and battle against tough Trainers...
ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_02_10:
That dream came true, but now I have a new
one: to defeat you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_03_10:
I’m so glad we were able to meet
here on Pasio!
ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0701_01_10:
Great timing! I’ve got something for you
that I think you’re gonna like!
ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0701_02_10:
Here, this is from me.
Make sure you take good care of it, OK?
ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0702_01_10:
I don’t know why, but giving people presents
always feels a little embarrassing.
ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0702_02_10:
Anyway, now that you have it,
you’ll have to decide how best to use it!
ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_01_10:
If you want to be better friends with your
Pokémon, my advice to you is to train in
an environment that it likes!
ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_02_10:
I use Water-type Pokémon, so I end up at
the beach more often than not.
ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_03_10:
For us, swimming, surfing, and spending
time together there is really important.
ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_01_10:
Hmm... Should I buy a new swimsuit or
some new clothes for training...
ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_02_10:
When it comes to self-improvement and
looking good, I never spare any expense.
ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_03_10:
Working on yourself is just as important
as working on your Pokémon!
ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you gotten used to Pasio yet?
For being an artificial island, it sure is huge.
ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_02_10:
Do you have a favorite spot that you
like to go to? If you do some exploring,
you might discover someplace new!
ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_03_10:
There aren’t any wild Pokémon to catch here,
but battling with all the different Trainers is
actually a lot of fun!
ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_01_10: The sunsets on Pasio are so pretty.
ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ve always loved gazing out at the sunset
back home on the Cerulean Cape, too.
ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_03_10:
I feel like it’s giving me a push—
like it’s telling me to do my best tomorrow, too!
ch0110_01_kasumi/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Starmie and I were just about
to go out for some early training!
ch0110_01_kasumi/3002_0701_01_10:
A quick swim right after you wake up 
is a perfect, refreshing start to the day!
ch0110_01_kasumi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Are you free right now?
How about a quick swim?
ch0110_01_kasumi/3004_0701_01_10:
Snack time’s over! Time to get out there
and use up all this energy! Wanna battle?
ch0110_01_kasumi/3005_0701_01_10:
Are you going out to train at this hour?
Have fun, but don’t overdo it!
ch0110_01_kasumi/3006_0701_01_10:
Man, I don’t feel sleepy at all yet!
Maybe it’s because I took a nap while
surfing with my Pokémon earlier...
